name: Root of War
description:
Relive your experiences of procrastinating and losing focus during class in this 2D tower defense game! Use your square root gun to spread out your turret arsenal and protect your notes from your own doodle creations! (PRO TIP: Use the pause button to plan out your strategy and set up your defenses!)

Play on Browser or download the windows version below.

For Global Game Jam 2023.

Program/ Level Design: William Wang, Tommy Hu

Graphic/ Effect: Seungmi Yang, Jiahao Guo
